### Heavy Duty Mechanic Services, Beaverlodge Research Farm
#### Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C032A


The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide heavy duty mechanic services for the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Beaverlodge Research Farm located in Alberta. The successful contractor will be required to provide services on an "as and when requested" basis.

#### Bid Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-9236-98704706
- **Bid Solicitation Date**: 2023-09-19
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-06T13:00:00 (closed)
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-06
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: October x, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: The contract period will be for one year from the date of contract with an option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

#### Security Requirements
The contractor must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS for all personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites.

#### Mandatory Technical Requirements
- Bids will be assessed in accordance with the entire requirement of the bid solicitation including the technical and financial evaluation criteria.
- Basis of selection: A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
- The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Submittal Requirements
Solicitations must be submitted to the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada at the address below.

#### Security Clearance
The Government of Canada has a valid RELIABILITY STATUS for all personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites. This clearance is mandatory for all contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites.

#### Procurement Office
- Melissa Smith, Contracting Specialist
- Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
- Western Service Centre
- 2010 12th Avenue, Bureau 300
- Regina, SK S4P 0M3
- Telephone: (306) 515-4796
- Email: [melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
- The contract will be awarded to the bid with the lowest price.
